title: Quirky hand written font
content:
Hi, can anyone identify the attached handwritten font ... much appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417181712im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0801_5504.jpg)
author: Meloncally

comments.content:
Dizzy Regular (inspired by the handwriting of Dizzy Gillespie), by Font Bureau:  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Dizzy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417181712/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Dizzy/ "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Dizzy/")
